General.Name: Gk Samolet Pao
General.Description: Samolet Group Public Joint Stock Company develops large-scale and complex urban areas primarily in Russia. The company also operates Samolet Plus, an online real estate services platform; manages commercial and rental real estate funds; and development projects across segments, such as esidential housing, resort real estate, and others. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

4.Name: Mr. Alexander  Ermak
4.Title: Deputy CEO for Project-Related Urban Planning & External Communications
